== Thanneermukkam (CT) (628222) ==

Thanneermukkam (CT) is a town in the [[Cherthala]] taluka of [[Alappuzha]] district with an area of 23.91 sq. km. and harbouring 7908 households with total population of 31525 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Alappuzha]] is at a distance of 32 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 178 km. Male population is 15349 and female population is 16176. Scheduled Caste population is 1184 and Scheduled Tribes population is 218. Census Location Code of the town is 628222<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Alappuzha (m + og) at a distance of 32 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 57 km. Railway station is at Cherthala at a distance of 10 km.
